News.headline: New Years Eve Disco At The Daggers
News.page_title: New Years Eve Disco At The Daggers
News.URL_keywords: New Years Eve Disco At The Daggers
News.short_description: The Daggers will be hosting a family disco on New Years Eve.
News.description:
The New Years Eve family disco which will be inside the Daggers Clubhouse will start from 7:30pm up until late. 

Tickets for the disco will be priced at:
Members - £8.00
Guests - £10.00
Children (Under 18's) - Free, but must be accompanied by an adult.

In order to buy tickets see Chris or Pam at the bar, call the clubhouse at 020 8592 1549 ext. 26, or email functions@daggers.co.uk
